channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-10186] Hive does not log Tez diagnostics on errors
item.description:
On an error, there is only a cryptic message such as:

"ERROR ql.Driver: FAILED: Execution Error, return code 2 from org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.exec.tez.TezTask"

Tez's DAGClient reports diagnostics which would provide more information to the user
item.summary: Hive does not log Tez diagnostics on errors

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I believe patch 1 fixes this. There's already a method to pass exceptions through to the driver (which will print them with the code.). So, in this patch we concatenate the diagnostic messages from tez and add them as a "HiveException" to the Task.
hitesh/vikram.dixit could you review please?
